As a swift action, the shaman imbues a single weapon sheâ€™s wielding with the bane weapon special ability, choosing the type of creature affected each time she does. The effect lasts for 1 minute. If the weapon already has the bane weapon special ability of the type chosen, the additional damage dealt by bane increases to 4d6.

The shaman can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + her Charisma modifier.
